website_summaries.verdict: Lux's Geo is a fine thermostat, but competing models from Honeywell, Ecobee and Emerson offer more features for roughly the same price.
pros: Set a geofencing radius and/or a recurring heating and cooling schedule with ease using the $149 Lux Geo thermostat's related app
you can mount the thermostat either horizontally or vertically
cons: The Lux Geo doesn't have any smart home partners, so don't expect it to work with Samsung SmartThings, Wink, IFTTT, Google Home, Apple HomeKit or Amazon Alexa

customer_reviews.title: new app 2.0 makes thermostat unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was originally very pleased with both the thermostat and the app but a recent forced app upgrade to v2.0 has been a disaster and literally made the unit unusable: app v2.0 no longer runs on my device: ASUS Chromebook Flip C434 there is no way to change from cooling to heating mode without the app so it is stuck in cooling mode until a factory reset if you go to the app download page it is littered with 1 star reviews starting on 9/30 when app v2.0 was force deployed Johnson Controls bought Lux in 2018 and things have been going downhill ever since. Would not recommend and will never buy again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Villars

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to install and simple to run. You just have to read the instructions. We’ve been using this for about a year now with no major issues. Until recently... they updated the app. The thermostat now continually disconnects from WiFi and constantly shows an “offline” status. I’ll reconnect it and within an hour it no longer responds to any temperature change, whether performed through the app or manually on the actual thermostat. It’s now completely useless. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: I am one of the ones who does not have a C wire nor the ability to plug into the wall. This was the only option. So far so good! Easy to install. Because I am on batteries- I give the thermostat more lead time before we leave for the beach house to account for the fact that it doesn’t check in immediately as it would if I was able to plug in. I have no sense how long the batteries will last so I’ve purchased a few as spares. Easy to use in person and the phone app works well. So....happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William N. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi thermostat if you have no c-wire
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat is nowhere near as pretty as an Ecobee or a Nest. I have an Ecobee on my main furnace in my house and I love that thermostat. This one is definitely a step down from it but to get WiFi thermostat with no c-wire or power adapter required this is pretty impressive. I have an old furnace in our extension and this replaced the old one easily and I can now control it from my phone which is all I was looking to do. If you have a c-wire and can install an Ecobee then definitely choose it over this but if you don't and just want to upgrade your existing thermostat this a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: After a year the LCD display is flaking out, but phone access is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the display going bad only after a year. I have two units, keeping an eye on the other one. I will say though that warming up the house while out of town to arrive home to a warm house using my cell phone is a great feature. The graphing of temperature and on-time of the heater/cooler for each hour is very handy for evaluating your energy usage for heating and cooling each day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, bad product, stops working.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage thermostat. Stopped working after 2 years. Customer service told me they could only replace it and couldn’t issue refund. They said they can send me a replacement, why would I want a replacement of the same crappy product if it is going to stop working again? Having to constantly replace the batteries with lithium batteries is annoying too. It is an issue when the thermostat completely stops working in the middle of the night when it is 32 degrees outside and your family freezes. It is a thermostat that sits on the wall, in my opinion it shouldn’t stop working.
customer_reviews.author: BATMAN

customer_reviews.title: My unit was defective
customer_reviews.text: I installed the new Lux thermostat and it seemed to go well initially -- it connected to wifi smoothly and the wiring connections appeared good. But a couple days later when the temperature rose my a/c wouldn't work. My HVAC guy came and initially thought something was seriously wrong, but upon further inspection it proved to be the thermostat. He checked my wiring and said it was done correctly. I ended up putting my old analog thermostat back on... rewired it and everything returned to working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Buy stock in AA batteries
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy without a c-wire. I keep it plugged in using a micro-usb cable. However it still requires batteries to connect to WiFi and smart services. This is where my huge issue arises. I am having to change batteries every 2 weeks. I just changed the batteries on Tuesday and today is Friday and just got an alert to replace them again. I would not recommend this product due to the battery use. UPDATE: After 1 year of use. The plug for the power supply broke inside. So now I cannot power the device except with batteries. I would not recommend this product. This is also not compatible with IFTTT for home automation.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything I Need It To
customer_reviews.text: I have one of those furnace/ac installations where I'm missing the "C" wire. This thermostat came with an adapter that effectively creates a "C" wire and powers the device. It was easy to set up, the app, although slighlty spartan, is easy to use. I like the overall simplicity and especially the geo-fencing to automatically enable "away" mode when we're more than a mile from home. It's worked flawlessly with no problems over the last three months, and smoothly transitioned from late summer cooling to winter heating without having to touch the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Yeroc Semaj

customer_reviews.title: This thermostat paid for itself in 1st month
customer_reviews.text: I submitted this thermostat receipt to my energy company and within 4 weeks received a rebate check for the whole amount of it. Also my December bill was $198 for gas and electric. In January was $127 a $61 savings with the 1st full month of this thermostat. Connection to my wifi and smartphone was a snap. I installed a Honeywell thermostat at my Aunt's cabin 9 months ago and it was a 6 hours before it synced with wifi and smartphone. So I knew I wasn't going to put Honeywell in my house. Plus a HVAC servicemen told me to go with a LUX.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Currently not compatible w/ iPhones
customer_reviews.text: One star because these thermostats are currently not compatible with iPhones due to a new Lux app, therefore my $100 WiFi thermostat is not currently able to be used on WiFi, the whole reason I bought a WiFi thermostat. Customer service said they are hoping to have a fix very soon. I will update when that happens, hopefully it is soon or I will have to return these thermostats and go with a non-WiFi thermostat as this is the only one capable of only running on battery power w/o a c wire.
customer_reviews.author: Jrsme

customer_reviews.title: Can't get geofencing to work consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over other wifi thermostats because of the geofencing feature. Everything except the geofencing feature worked as expected. It only works about 1 out of 10 times. I have it set for a 1 1/2 mile radius. I'm currently 200 miles away and it still has not kicked on. A text to tech support three days ago went unanswered. Now I'll be in the process of uninstalling and reinstalling the app, unpairing and pairing with my phone, in the hope of getting better results. If you get those for the geofencing feature, I hope you have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Allen M. Parsell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace an old Honeywell manual thermostat with a WiFi enabled thermostat. I do not have a 5th wire so I was dependent on the battery capability to make it work. I have had it one month and the batteries are still working fine or as the application indicates they are "GOOD". The issue I have are the instructions to eliminate the batteries and operate off the furnace blower. This is done via the "Bridge" supplied by the manufacturer. Its not straight forward and involves a bit of handiwork but other than that I like the product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lf9778

customer_reviews.title: LUX is unreliable. Stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: We installed the Lux Geo about 3 months ago. It quit working today. It wasn’t connecting with the unit. The HVAC guy said he wasn’t surprised because LUX was an unreliable brand. He installed a Nest thermostat for us and now we are back in business. While we had the LUX thermostat - it took about 15 minutes for any temperature changes we made through the app or via Google Home to take effect. The LUX app is not intuitive. The scheduling section is clunky. But hey, it looked nice!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: Good T-stat. Mobile app crashes
customer_reviews.text: This was the only tsat I could find that didn't need a C wire or aux power supply. It runs off batteries. Installation of the unit itself was very simple, 2 wires. The unit has worked fine for 5 months but now the battery has died. There is an internal battery counter that needs to be reset or else the unit will keep shutting down, even with new batteries. Tech support was very helpful to walk me through the reset and now it's working again. The mobile app still keeps crashing though, thus the 3 star review. Fix this and you get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fireman Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with the Thermostat. works as advertised. App is a little glitchy at first but seems to be fine now. I have a boiler and NO "C" wire so I just use the batteries. I have just the two wires connected and didn't need any of the other included accessories. I will tell you that they do not show my particular simple wiring example in the instructions so you will just have to match up the wires to the terminals that you had on your old thermostat. Overall, very pleased with being able see the temp of my house remotely as it provides a lot of peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chet L.

customer_reviews.title: new app does not work
customer_reviews.text: I had two Lux GEOs for about 5 years. They worked well. Lux updated their app. The new app does not work with iPhones. Lux is "trying dilgently" to fix it. In the meantime...if you have an iPhone, don't waste your time buying a Lux Geo. It won't work. October 10, 2020
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong color but oh well it works
customer_reviews.text: Took one star off because I ordered white and they sent black. The black stands out against the light walls but I was anxious to switch out my old, no longer functional thermostats so I didn’t bother sending them back. The old thermostats were nearly 30 years old and made by Lux so I’m hopeful these will last another 30. I would like to be able to set a schedule with more than 4 intervals, that’s one thing I would change about it. Otherwise it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Constantly losing Wlan Connection
customer_reviews.text: I really wished this Thermostat worked - because you are kind of stuck without a C Wire... However - this piece of junk works for a couple of weeks and then will constantly drop your Wlan connection. It even recovers it now and then, but on some occasions, it forces you to go through all of the really painful and randomly successful Wlan connection process. Mine lasted 2 months before it stopped dropping connections - and neither changing batteries or anything else helped. It is just cheaply engineered junk! Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiro

customer_reviews.title: Wifi Constantly Disconnects
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat works fine to control my AC/heater. HOWEVER, it is constantly going offline...and I mean constantly. When I try to reconnect it to my wifi, the app always has server errors. I've given up on the Wi-Fi portion of this thermostat. It's super disappointing because I bought this specific thermostat so I could enroll in the City's energy control program.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Good for baseboard hot water
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these used, one for $61 and second for $91. The price increased drastically recently with the cold weather. Both devices needed to be reset by calling the service number. Service is exceptionally good. I was able to balance the bedroom circuit with the kitchen circuit (and woodstove) using the run time history. The calibration mode works well for me contrary to some of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: It looks so stylish and I love the big temperature display--so easy to read across the room. But in spite of nearly a month of emails back and forth with tech support, I have been unable to complete the process of connecting it to WiFi using the Android app. I tried it with two different phones on two different WiFi networks (both very standard), but the setup process always hangs at the same point. This item has the potential to be a great product, but first Lux needs to fix the bugs in the app and/or thermostat firmware. Perhaps someday they'll also recognize the need for tech support on Saturdays, when most DIY projects get done.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: and I am very happy that it works
customer_reviews.text: Here is a real review. The Lux is a contender to the nest, I couldn't operate a nest due to my existing wiring, but this one I can. I went from a Mercury analog thermostat to this, and I am very happy that it works. 4 stars only because it is not very responsive. The wifi connects with Lux servers and has a refresh rate of 10 minutes, so if you change something via wifi / internet or app, expect nothing to happen for 5-10 minutes until the server refreshes. Where as the nest happens more instantly. Other than that the functions work great, you can see the runtime on the unit and app.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I've never had any issues with wifi dropping out, and I love the flexibility. This thermostat wires just like any other thermostat, and adding a C wire takes all of 5 minutes for most people (if you have at least one spare thermostat wire, which most do, you are in business- you air handler already has a spot to connect for C). Easy installation, great app, and most importantly- it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: App is worthless and makes it unusable
customer_reviews.text: The good is it uses battery to connect to internet where most require dedicated power. The bad is, the app hardly works to do its job. if you are someone that wants to use your phone to control this thing this one is NOT for you. it takes sometimes an hour before the app "talks" to the base.
customer_reviews.author: BigCrab

customer_reviews.title: It wont connect to their cloud
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect but works just like an old thermostat. It wont connect to the cloud. Tried it multiple times always tells me to restart the process. Update: I called lux and they had to clear it from their end because someone had registered the device already. Call took 3 minutes with wait and had the device working properly. Great costumer service.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as a Honeywell product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have 2 air handler units so we bought 2 of these products (one for the second floor and one for the main floor) and they work great. I get notifications when the device is offline. I also am able to change the temperatures to the presets that I have when I am away from that house, which saves me a lot of money on my energy bills. One other added benefit of this is that I can see how long my power has been out by looking at the online settings. It is also nice that the unit can be powered by so many different ways.
customer_reviews.author: JarCon

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Love being able to control it on my way back from vacation. I would highly recommend not depending on the batteries and having a c wire. It blow through batteries otherwise. Also great because the state gives me a rebate for the entire thing so it was free. I would highly recommend but setup is a little bit of a pain
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: General install and set up was easy enough with the app but you will need knowledge ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had two of these for a year now. At install, took a call to support to figure out the wiring was right but the yellow piece next to the wiring had to be on one prong and off the other...that is not in the manual. General install and set up was easy enough with the app but you will need knowledge on how to switch back and foeth between wifi connections on your phone to get the wifi set up done. Noticed a couple of months in the calibration was off and was off by more than two degrees, showing warmer than it really was which can increase your energy bill. Other than that they have worked very well
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Sensible alternative to the Nest Thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: Want all the functionality of the Nest, minus a little of the aesthetic, and a lot of the cost? This is the thing to get. Also, the Nest requires specific thermostat wiring that older houses will not have (the 'C' wire) -- this works with all thermostat wiring configurations. I really like it. I hardly know anything about thermostats and I managed to install it following the simple instructions in only a few minutes, and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: II alos personally like the design
customer_reviews.text: I have not completed the installation or set up this thermostat as of yet because Im redoing the wiring so I dont have to use the battery feature. I purchased the Lux because the screen is large for easier reading and the thermostat can be mounted either horizontally or vertically. I also personally like the design. It is being used at our lake home and being able to monitor and adjust the temperature remotely is a plus. For our use I didnt need to spend the additional money to purchase a more expensive thermostat that could "learn" our habits.
customer_reviews.author: impk

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Nest or Ecobee for older furnaces
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. Had a bad experience with Ecobee after I ordered the thermostat and extra sensors. Then they told me I need to buy a relay and power transformer and new thermostat cabling. Spent a weekend stringing new wire and never got the damn thing to work. Worst of all was the complete non-responsiveness of their customer support. So, I ordered this Lux GEO and had it installed within 15 minutes. Setup was easier than the Ecobee and it does exactly what I need - ad I prefer the app to the Ecobee app. All of this and it was $200 cheaper. Very happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Raoul Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to existing heating zones.
customer_reviews.text: I have two others already installed in our house. This is my third one. It helps me monitor/control the temps in all of my heating zones. My only issue to date is the lag time from app to actual set point/ mode changing at the thermostat. There is a delay from when I make a change on iOS app to seeing the change on the thermostat, it is not immediate. Other than that, awesome. Perfectly suits my hot water heating system.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as well  as i had hoped
customer_reviews.text: The unit when on line works well. I have it installed in a vacation home using AA batteries as i do not have a C wire, old heating system. But its seems when we lose the Wifi connection the unit does not come back on line when the wifi is restored, i need to use the reset button. But since this at a vacation home some 200 miles away its not easy. I have asked tech support what the problem is and they said just hit the reset button. My daughter has these units installed in her home and never has had the issue. I would not recommend this unit if you plan on installing at a remote location.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a 2 wire heating system
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install, and when I wanted to confirm the wiring the support staff confirmed that it was wired correctly. We have seen improvement in warmth as well as being able to control the system remotely to override the set schedule. The app that works with this device shows when the heat is on and for how long so that tracking is easy. I would recommend this to anyone that would like an automated thermostat with WiFi for a great price, easy to use, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine B Mayer

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: I wish I never bought this! Followed the instructions to install and it did not work. After hiring someone to install it, the AC worked but winter has come around and no heat. The customer service number does not connect to anyone (tried both during initial installation and again now that it's briskly fall). I would discourage anyone from purchasing this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Pandy

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: We installed this thermostat a month or so ago, replacing a very old and dysfunctional mercury one. We do not have a c-wire, and needed to replace the thermostat quickly. This one was easy to install, I set it up in less than 10 minutes with geofencing on both of our smart phones without a hitch. I haven't had any wifi-connectivity issues, the geofencing works quite well, and it heats our home much more efficiently. No more constant cycling of the furnace. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the headache
customer_reviews.text: Are you an electrician or an AC expert? No, then you're screwed with this shoddy product. They directions were written by, I'm guessing, a team of drunk monkeys, and laid-out by blind aliens. You'll never be able to install this on your own. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Geofencing -Great Feature
customer_reviews.text: The geofencing feature in this thermostat really sets it apart. No one has to think about tuning the thermostat before they leave the house or tuning when they get within a certain distance from home. The product looks nice on the wall, it was easy to install, it was easy to setup/ register on the LUX website, and it was easy to setup the mobile app. Quasi-downsides: If your phone dies before you get home, the geofencing won't work, obviously! There is no way to lock the wall unit from whatbI can tell. My young kids wanted to play with it quite a bit when first installed.
customer_reviews.author: jonnyrivers7

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat for systems without a C-wire
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice to come into the house that's warm on a cold winter day. We bought one for our vacation house and adjust the thermostat at about 2 hours before arrival. Works as promised. We purchased this after trying another brand that won't work without the C wire. This one installed easily, internet set up was quick and simple. Very happy with product and will be purchasing two more for additional zones -- although I wish the price was a little lower!
customer_reviews.author: EllenH

customer_reviews.title: but once are you kinda figure it out it provides a lot of info and is pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about two weeks now. The instructions were a little unclear but was able to figure it out. The app and interface is setup a little odd, but once are you kinda figure it out it provides a lot of info and is pretty easy to use. Also, biggest positive for me is no C wire required. It can run on batteries when the c wire is not an option. So if you're looking for a wifi thermostat and don't have the c wire, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: BuccoBruce

customer_reviews.title: Quick install, looks great -- perf for 2 wire configurations!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far! I only have two wires-- W and R--- and found the directions that came with the unit a bit confusing. I ended up using common sense to install it instead and it works perfectly. No complaints, it was on the wall in 15 minutes. I haven't gone through app set up yet but I may eventually. It looks great and is super easy to operate. 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: KathrynOfficial

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but now keeps disconnecting from network and app - has become more of a hassle than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Relatively easy to install and program and the app was handy. Everything worked well for the first 1-2 months. But now it keeps disconnecting from the wireless network so the app doesn't work at all. The manual controls are quite finicky, hard to read and hard to set. I replaced the battery but problems persist. Looks like I might have to reset everything and reprogram it from the start. So it's become more of a hassle than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martens

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to install and having remote access to our heating system is a plus. Can be used with 24v AC wiring or not, which makes it very flexible at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love all the features
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble installing it but after calling for support it was up and running great! We have had it over 6 months and it has more than paid for itself in utility savings. Love the geofencing and being able to monitor run times. We picked this thermostat because it didn’t have to have a ground wire or neutral.
customer_reviews.author: 50315 shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Easy To Set Up
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made thermostat. It has a good feature set without over doing the data collection thing. It was easy to install (I have a C wire) and easy to set up. It integrated into my home automation system with Alexa easily. It's got clean lines and is good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Eats Batteries like Crazy!!
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat eats so many AA batteries! We've had it a little over a year and it goes offline about once a month due to running out of batteries. I'll be looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: saturn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, and very easy install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, and very easy install. Super convenient for me because I always forget to change the thermostat before I leave for work or to go out of town. This makes it easy for me to switch it to away mode, or to just adjust the temperature from my phone whenever I feel necessary. I also love the app feature that shows you how much the unit has run each hour (and an overall total time for the day) helps me see how much energy it uses.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Stoker

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd smart thermostat. I so wanted this to work...... I really liked this one......All the other reviews said such good things about it & on line & at the website also YouTube reviews But the smart unit didn't sign on my WiFi returned it.... Was 11 degrees over actual room temperature... Couldn't calibrate to actual temperature.... I m getting good at removing the old & installing a new one
customer_reviews.author: Rodger B. Terrey

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 6 months. Now it will not connect to the wifi. It keeps giving me a password error. I have reset multiple times. Both hard and soft reset. Restarted my router. Change batteries. Still, same error.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Save your time & money
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had a real winner but I returned this because the app does not work and without it this is just another pretty thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: JIM0421

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made in years!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Thermostat is the best thing I've bought in years!! We live in the Sierra Nevada Mountains where it gets very cold. It is so great to be able to turn up our heat from away from home! Since we have an older heat only system without a "C" wire this was the only thermostat I found that would work for us. The batteries do the trick. It took a bit to get the Wi-FI hooked up. The rest was a breeze! The app has worked perfectly since we hooked it up 5 days ago. Wish I had it long ago. No more coming home to a cold house!!
customer_reviews.author: Edith Lott

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install for a female who is NOT an electrician
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today and installed it right away... Very easy install for a female who is NOT an electrician. It is working very well and I loved the online setup. The videos also help you to set it up in case of any questions. Hands down the best feature was the radius setting. I usually leave the AC on during the day for my dogs since it is pretty hot in California. But I like it nice and cold when I actually am home, so the radius setting will really improve my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: JiLL

customer_reviews.title: Go For IT
customer_reviews.text: Just as good - probably better, than the main stream popular brand that Lowes and Homey Depot sells. A great value for the money. Been using it for 3 years without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kozlarek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Thermostat, Will not buy another Lux product
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat broke the air conditioning unit somehow and only allowed the air handler to push hot air. I live in AZ and it made me sleep in 96 degrees inside my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Gellentien

customer_reviews.title: ... three for three zones they set up quite fast pretty easy and they look great just subtle enough and ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed three for three zones they set up quite fast pretty easy and they look great just subtle enough and just cool enough I'm a fan so far. However I did think they could be used with Alexa and it is not however not really necessary the app is very easy to access and use
customer_reviews.author: Davidot

customer_reviews.title: Incredible thermostat without a cwire
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little thermostat. My furnace didn’t have a c-wire, but this thing works. I love the geo fence on the app. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kolby Milton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing WiFi thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Just installed Lux WiFi thermostat 2 days ago in a 101 year old home with a 2 wire system. Install incredibly easy. Programming incredibly easy. Remote access to thermostat is exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with separate B and O wires.
customer_reviews.text: I had a 90s hesting and cooling system 2 zone heat and separate air conditioning unit outside. B and O wires used for different things on a 7 wire setup. This was the only compatible wifi thermostat for my situation. I tried Nest and ecobee prior to this. Happy to say its setup and working great.
customer_reviews.author: nara.vuong

customer_reviews.title: That it worked on batteries, but very short life.
customer_reviews.text: Batteries do not last more than 4 months. Not very good APP, difficult to program.
customer_reviews.author: EDUARDO

customer_reviews.title: Still Not working well
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a week but now real slow updating from app. While in house on local network! 2 units doing this. A real POS.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a c wire so finding something was tricky but this is exactly what I needed. Just installed it and played around for a little so this is still new to me. However so far so good. Installation was easy. Pairing with my Google phone was easy. Pairing with my Alexa was easy AND it's very slick and good looking with the back plate.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my simple two wire furnace.
customer_reviews.text: This actually was a gift. I didn't think I'd use it much, but find the "Away" feature to be very useful. Being able to see the last time it communicated with the server gives some reassurance that the house still has power when I am out of town for an extended time in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have both Nest and Lux installed in my house. Considering cost of Nest, Lux is great value for money. Only downside is Nest has a motion sensor that displays temperature when you are in the vicinity. Consideration is that do you want to pay almost double the price for Nest for this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sunder Nadarajah

customer_reviews.title: WIFI craps out almost immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and I got this specifically since it works with 4 wire systems but WIFI stopped working an hour later and resetting it twice does nothing to get it back online so it is completely useless in that regard. It works fine off the device itself but I'm wish I went with something else since WIFI capabilities was what I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Great product(it can work with a 2 or 3 wire system)only wi fi thermostat that works with a 2 wire system.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Record

customer_reviews.title: A more in depth review to come....
customer_reviews.text: I will be updating this, as I’ve only had the unit for less than a week. The one thing that I wish they would have is a watch app, which would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and works except when it doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and works except when it doesn’t. So far I have noticed the Away function works when you leave the area but when you come back it stays Away. I also noticed the thermostat last contact can be about an hour ago. Is this simply because it’s battery and doesn’t always check in to conserve power?
customer_reviews.author: JRV81

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome thermostat. So easy to program and use. Love the large numbers on the temp display.
customer_reviews.author: JanM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect device - easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described. Much more attractive than the other devices and with vertical mounting fit where no other device would fit. I can read the display without my glasses on. The app is wonderful (turn on heat while driving home from vacation).
customer_reviews.author: ideabuzz

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool! That's about it. The worst for Wi-fi connectivity! Drops connection constantly and I have to re-boot router to gain connectivity. Now - its not running the settings I have programmed thru the app. Will be replacing after I do some serious research on a decent unit!. POS! Stay Away!
customer_reviews.author: Ratfink

customer_reviews.title: Terrible app
customer_reviews.text: App takes 15 minutes for the the thermostat to register changes. Basically useless. I rather walk to thermostat and change manually than wait so long.
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Keeping up with the times, replaced my condo Lux of 13 years.
customer_reviews.text: I just need to get my hands on making sure I wired this correctly. But everything from installation to connecting it online worked great. I did notice a little difference in some instructions for setting this up. Less that, I was able to get it up and running in under 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: mike000mike

customer_reviews.title: Great option if your system has a separate O and B wire
customer_reviews.text: Since my system was incompatible with the Nest and Ecobee, this was a great option since my HVAC system had separate O/B wires and not a combined O/B wire. The smartphone app is a little dated and could use some updating, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ku

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: We are living out smart thermostat. Very easy too use.
customer_reviews.author: Debstanley12

customer_reviews.title: Buy something different!
customer_reviews.text: If the unit loses contact with the internet you can't remotely reconnect. For some reason, it won't hold the away temperature that I set. It says away and if I go to the settings it says what the temp I set (50 degrees) but that's not what the thermostat does, it reverts to the default setting of 70 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Works without a c, or common wire.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my pellet stove. I have a quadrafire cb1200.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Pothier

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted 2 years and when it worked it was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Gillie

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with my systems.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only smart thermostat I could find to work with my 24v zone controlled boiler system. I plan on buying another for the other zone and the A/C system, which is located on a different floor. So far, this thermostat has exceeded my expectations. I like the simplicity of the app, which provides useful info.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this! The company made this seems closed for business. The product becomes useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last oct. Couple weeks ago, it suddenly could not connect online. I emailed them and got no reply. Then called their tech support center and found out their phone line is disconnected. Without connecting to its server, this product becomes useless!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermostat for folks with no "C" wire - runs off batteries.s
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easy set up. Works with an app without any difficulty. Love the fact that it runs for a year on batteries. Bought five of these for our five zone home and got $500 back from Mass Save Rebates...so costs $35 for 5!!! Check your area for rebates. Would purchase again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: F. R. Lucca

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn’t last more than 30 days. Losses internet connection all the time. Get a nest!
customer_reviews.author: joe romano

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give this thermostat 5 five start because it is perfect for someone like me with an older furnace without a C-wire and with a tight budget not being able to pay someone to add a c wire. It has been a little over a week am now and works like a charm. It was easy to setup and now I’m able to save energy with my programmable thermostat. Another added perk is that it works with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rene

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use wireless Wi-Fi and home thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Many features yet easy to use. Easy to 2 or 3 wire installation.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: A bit daunting at first. to install because of ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit daunting at first . to install because of existing tstat mounting. Be patient and go slow on the programing and you will have a really sleek set up . Really impressive what it can do. BTW dont go nutz over the delay in response time the unit takes your commands .
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl N. Muzzillo

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 lux Geos and had one fail in less than a year. Quality is questionable and probably would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: steven smith

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Never could get the App to step through the WiFi set up correctly. Why it cant connect to wifi without the useless app is anyone’s guess. Done wasting time with this piece of crap. Life is too short.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Item description says new - I got a used thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Box was open on arrival, thermostat has scratches on the face. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoleski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wifi thermostat if you don't have a c wire.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, and was very easy to install. I needed a wifi thermostat, that didn't need a "c wire", and after a thorough search I decided to try this one. Using the android app to connect is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Noah C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Good!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to. But does the job. Lux was recommended to me by my oil burner guy. I left a star off because the app could be a little easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: djmco

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple thermostat works from web app and Alexa. We do not have C wire and used just the batteries. Manufacturer says Alexa won’t work with batteries but it does. Tried more expensive devices would not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love the ability to check and change my home temperature ...
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to set up the app on my phone, but with a little help from customer support I was succesful. Been using it for a few weeks with no problems. Love the ability to check and change my home temperature from across the country, making a trip a lot less stressful when from Wisconsin and worrying about freezing pipes! Raising the temperature a few hours before arriving home from a trip makes coming home even more enjoyable!!
customer_reviews.author: CPN

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and instillation
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on the weekend at my cottage which has a microvolt direct vent gas wall heater. Wi-Fi setup took about 10 minutes and the actual installation of the thermostat took about 5 minutes. This has worked flawlessly since I installed it. It will be interesting to see how long the batteries last.
customer_reviews.author: Paul MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Having access to control the thermostat from an app is great, and the reports is shows are useful
customer_reviews.text: I use the Lux Geo to control my wood pellet fireplace that does not have a C wire to power a thermostat. After six months of use, it is still using the same batteries that came with it. Having access to control the thermostat from an app is great, and the reports is shows are useful.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable swing temperature
customer_reviews.text: Service department is outstanding. They will stand behind their product. Works good seems a little wonky when using the geofence feature. Adjustable delta T or swing temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my 2 thermostats
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these for a few months now. Very pleased with them. Installation was pretty easy - definitely better than dealing with the power wire that all the other wifi thermostats require. The app interface on iPhone works well.
customer_reviews.author: NJ CD

customer_reviews.title: After figuring out how to set it up i love it. Make sure you go through the set ...
customer_reviews.text: After figuring out how to set it up i love it. Make sure you go through the set up. You have to tell it what kind of ac/heater you have. The instructions do not tell you that. I spent 2 days thinking it was wired wrong. Once I set it to heat pump all was well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good except doesn't reset if wifi signal lost
customer_reviews.text: Thermo was easy to set up & connect to wifi, but doesn't reset itself after loss of signal. The Honeywell I got works on local network, not via internet. Much better method.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install for a two wire propane stove and have had no issues with monitoring or changing settings from away. Connected to Verizon mifi hotspot at all times, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: easy to read dial
customer_reviews.text: loved the size of numbers, would like the display to always stay on
customer_reviews.author: Elg

product_meta.title: Lux Products GEO-WH Wi-Fi Thermostat, White
product_meta.description: Say hello to LUX/GEO the first WiFi thermostat with true-battery power. This universal system compatible thermostat offers 3-power options: 2 AA Lithium batteries, a micro-USB, or the C-wire. The LUX/GEO delivers flexibility and control all with the touch of your smartphone screen or with the intuitive control wheel interface. This 7-day programmable thermostat is packed with features, including radius geofencing.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Installs quickly like a standard thermostat. Unique horizontal or vertical mount capability.
Easy set-up and programming directly from unit.
Free iOS or Android App makes home comfort flexible & mobile.
App features geofencing option with easy "away" and "back" settings for added savings and comfort.
Three power options: battery only (2-AA lithium batteries included), micro-USB connection (cord not included) or system power (C-wire).
Works with Amazon Alexa enabled devices when installed with c-wire or USB power options

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars375 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
